originContent: > **An opinionated list of essential resources for aspiring Detection Engineers.**
translatedContent: > **An opinionated list of essential resources for aspiring Detection Engineers.**

originContent: The goal of this starter pack is to provide a curated selection of resources to help you get started in detection engineering without feeling overwhelmed. This list is based on personal experience with various detection technologies. Hope it helps! üöÄ
translatedContent: The goal of this starter pack is to provide a curated selection of resources to help you get started in detection engineering without feeling overwhelmed. This list is based on personal experience with various detection technologies. Hope it helps! üöÄ

originContent: [Connect with others to discuss all things threat detection and security engineering.](https://discord.gg/HAVyDtUunu)
translatedContent: [Connect with others to discuss all things threat detection and security engineering.](https://discord.gg/HAVyDtUunu)

originContent: - [MITRE ATT&CK](https://attack.mitre.org/) - The #1 knowledge base of adversary tactics and techniques.
translatedContent: - [MITRE ATT&CK](https://attack.mitre.org/) - The #1 knowledge base of adversary tactics and techniques.

originContent: - [Top 10 ATT&CK Techniques](https://top-attack-techniques.mitre-engenuity.org/) - A customisable page to display the most common ATT&CK techniques.
translatedContent: - [Top 10 ATT&CK Techniques](https://top-attack-techniques.mitre-engenuity.org/) - A customisable page to display the most common ATT&CK techniques.

originContent: - [Hacking the Cloud](https://hackingthe.cloud/) - A collection of resources for understanding cloud-focused attack techniques.
translatedContent: - [Hacking the Cloud](https://hackingthe.cloud/) - A collection of resources for understanding cloud-focused attack techniques.

originContent: - [The DFIR Report](https://thedfirreport.com/) - Real-world incidents analysed and described with a defender's mindset. A personal favourite.
translatedContent: - [The DFIR Report](https://thedfirreport.com/) - Real-world incidents analysed and described with a defender's mindset. A personal favourite.

originContent: > **Example repositories showcasing how detections are structured and applied.**
translatedContent: > **Example repositories showcasing how detections are structured and applied.**

originContent: - [Splunk Detection Rules](https://research.splunk.com/detections/) - A collection of detection rules for Splunk.
translatedContent: - [Splunk Detection Rules](https://research.splunk.com/detections/) - A collection of detection rules for Splunk.

originContent: - [Elastic Detection Rules](https://github.com/elastic/detection-rules/tree/main/rules) - A collection of detection rules for Elastic.
translatedContent: - [Elastic Detection Rules](https://github.com/elastic/detection-rules/tree/main/rules) - A collection of detection rules for Elastic.

originContent: - [Detection Studio](https://detection.studio/) - Convert Sigma rules to other detection rule syntaxes.
translatedContent: - [Detection Studio](https://detection.studio/) - Convert Sigma rules to other detection rule syntaxes.

originContent: > **Tools to play with that are either open source or have a free-tier element.**
translatedContent: > **Tools to play with that are either open source or have a free-tier element.**

originContent: - [Aurora](https://www.nextron-systems.com/aurora/) - An agent that can run Sigma rules. Load up your Sigma rules, and create alerts from your event logs.
translatedContent: - [Aurora](https://www.nextron-systems.com/aurora/) - An agent that can run Sigma rules. Load up your Sigma rules, and create alerts from your event logs.

originContent: - [Velociraptor](https://github.com/Velocidex/velociraptor) - A digital forensic and incident response tool that enhances your visibility into your endpoints.
translatedContent: - [Velociraptor](https://github.com/Velocidex/velociraptor) - A digital forensic and incident response tool that enhances your visibility into your endpoints.

originContent: - [Falco](https://github.com/falcosecurity/falco) - A cloud-native runtime security tool to detect threats within containers.
translatedContent: - [Falco](https://github.com/falcosecurity/falco) - A cloud-native runtime security tool to detect threats within containers.

originContent: - [Suricata](https://suricata.io/) - Detection rules designed to interrogate network traffic for suspicious activity.
translatedContent: - [Suricata](https://suricata.io/) - Detection rules designed to interrogate network traffic for suspicious activity.

originContent: - [YARA](https://github.com/virustotal/yara) - Detection rules for identifying and classifying malware samples.
translatedContent: - [YARA](https://github.com/virustotal/yara) - Detection rules for identifying and classifying malware samples.
- [Elastic Stack (ELK)](https://www.elastic.co/elastic-stack) - A suite of tools for search, logging, and analytics.

originContent: - [Elastic Stack (ELK)](https://www.elastic.co/elastic-stack) - A suite of tools for search, logging, and analytics.

translatedContent: - [Tines](https://www.tines.com/) - A no-code automation platform for security teams. Great for automating anything, quickly. Has a free tier.

originContent: - [Tines](https://www.tines.com/) - A no-code automation platform for security teams. Great for automating anything, quickly. Has a free tier.

translatedContent: - [Adversary Emulation Library](https://github.com/center-for-threat-informed-defense/adversary_emulation_library) - A library of adversary emulation plans.

originContent: - [Adversary Emulation Library](https://github.com/center-for-threat-informed-defense/adversary_emulation_library) - A library of adversary emulation plans.

translatedContent: - [Stratus Red Team](https://github.com/DataDog/stratus-red-team) - A tool for adversary emulation in the cloud.

originContent: - [Stratus Red Team](https://github.com/DataDog/stratus-red-team) - A tool for adversary emulation in the cloud.
translatedContent: - [Atomic Red Team](https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team) - A library of simple adversary emulation tests.

originContent: - [Atomic Red Team](https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team) - A library of simple adversary emulation tests.
translatedContent: - [TTPForge](https://github.com/facebookincubator/TTPForge) - A tool for creating and managing TTPs.

originContent: - [TTPForge](https://github.com/facebookincubator/TTPForge) - A tool for creating and managing TTPs.

translatedContent: - [Detection Engineering Behavior Maturity Model](https://www.elastic.co/security-labs/elastic-releases-debmm) - a structured approach for security teams to consistently mature their processes and behaviors from Elastic.

originContent: - [Detection Engineering Behavior Maturity Model](https://www.elastic.co/security-labs/elastic-releases-debmm) - a structured approach for security teams to consistently mature their processes and behaviors from Elastic.
translatedContent: - [Alerting Detection Strategy (ADS) Framework](https://github.com/palantir/alerting-detection-strategy-framework/blob/master/ADS-Framework.md) - A simple framework for building detection strategies from Palantir.

originContent: - [Alerting Detection Strategy (ADS) Framework](https://github.com/palantir/alerting-detection-strategy-framework/blob/master/ADS-Framework.md) - A simple framework for building detection strategies from Palantir.
translatedContent: - [Summiting the Pyramid](https://center-for-threat-informed-defense.github.io/summiting-the-pyramid/?utm_source=ctidio&utm_medium=shortlink) - Building on the 'pyramid of pain', this work defines what it really means to have a robust detection.

originContent: - [Summiting the Pyramid](https://center-for-threat-informed-defense.github.io/summiting-the-pyramid/?utm_source=ctidio&utm_medium=shortlink) - Building on the 'pyramid of pain', this work defines what it really means to have a robust detection.
translatedContent: - [Capability Abstraction](https://posts.specterops.io/capability-abstraction-fbeaeeb26384) - One of my favourite articles - 'Capability Abstraction' from SpecterOps. Explores similar concepts to the above 'summiting the pyramid' project.

originContent: - [Capability Abstraction](https://posts.specterops.io/capability-abstraction-fbeaeeb26384) - One of my favourite articles - 'Capability Abstraction' from SpecterOps. Explores similar concepts to the above 'summiting the pyramid' project.

originContent: - [Blue Team Labs Online](https://blueteamlabs.online/) - A platform for hands-on blue team training.

originContent: - [ACE Responder](https://www.aceresponder.com/) - A realistic and immersive platform for existing cyber defenders and newcomers alike.

translatedContent: > **A handpicked selection of materials that have inspired me.**

originContent: > **A handpicked selection of materials that have inspired me.**

translatedContent: - [Detections.ai](https://detections.ai/) - An AI-powered and community-driven platform to share & improve detection rules. Use invite code `StarterPack`.

originContent: - [Detections.ai](https://detections.ai/) - An AI-powered and community-driven platform to share & improve detection rules. Use invite code `StarterPack`.

originContent: - [ACEResponder](https://x.com/ACEResponder) - An X account sharing attacker techniques visually.

translatedContent: - [Detect FYI](https://detect.fyi/) - A Medium publication focused solely on detection engineering.

translatedContent: - [Detection Engineering Weekly](https://www.detectionengineering.net/) - A weekly newsletter on Detection Engineering.

originContent: - [Prioritizing Detection Engineering](https://medium.com/starting-up-security/prioritizing-detection-engineering-b60b46d55051) - A well-written piece from Ryan McGeehan on how to think about prioritising your detection engineering efforts.
